job description:
ASRC Federal Field Services (AFSS) is seeking a cleared Integration and Test Engineer in support of an antenna engineering support contract in Port St. Johns, FL (near Cape Canaveral).

Role/Responsibilities:

Individuals performing this function systematically analyze data, test developmental and operational hardware characteristics and performance of components under various environmental conditions and for functional compliance, and test the interaction of software modules and interfaces to ensure operational compliance with predefined program requirements.
  • Responsibilities include flowing down system level requirements to individual tests for requirement verification and validation, and logistical equipment planning for integrated testing.
  • Additional responsibilities include testing individual subsystems and integrating them into a system level tests which verify proper interaction of all subsystem interfaces.
  • Considerable travel, both CONUS and OCONUS, may be required.
ASRC Federal and its Subsidiaries are Equal Opportunity / Affirmative Action employers. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, gender, color, age, sexual orientation, gender identification, national origin, religion, marital status, ancestry, citizenship, disability, protected veteran status, or any other factor prohibited by applicable law.
